text:
@realDonaldTrump @PressSec @realDonaldTrump should just say "thank you truckers!" The only god you believe in is yourself. 
What have you done to help truckers? You allowed coronavirus into US, are not doing testing even at low levels you stated over a month ago, blocked efforts to help Americans survive!
